channel.title: Help, dont know how to turn my server on?
channel.description: Ok i got a server but i dont know how to start and run it? Where to i start it to turn server on and where do i get my ip and port to use for it to get in? [br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 07:11:57 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Help, dont know how to turn my server on?
item.dc:creator: @cody123 cody123
item.description:
@cody123 wrote:

Y can i use 127.0.0.1?? what makes me different. My friend gave me server and he ran it before its called cazzscape i believe and now i dunno how to get my own ip and port for it and start it up.[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 08:24:53 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Help, dont know how to turn my server on?
item.dc:creator: @KingCjownz KingCjownz
item.description:
@KingCjownz wrote:

run runserver.bat and use moparscape client and log in as the ip of 127.0.0.1 only you can use this everyone else has to use either no-ip or hamachi.
